quests.name: Basic Machine Frame
quests.description: You won't be able to use additional augments with this frame.

tasks.longDescription: A task where the player needs specific items. These do not have to be handed in, having them in one's inventory is enough.

quests.name: Tesseract
quests.description: Still quite buggy due to a forge issue. Transfers items, liquids, and power.

quests.name: Redstone Furnace
quests.description: A furnace that uses RF instead of burning items.

tasks.longDescription: A task where the player needs specific items. These do not have to be handed in, having them in one's inventory is enough.

quests.name: Saw Mill
quests.description: Processes wood logs into more wooden planks and can recycle wooden objects.

tasks.longDescription: A task where the player needs specific items. These do not have to be handed in, having them in one's inventory is enough.
A task where the player needs specific items. These do not have to be handed in, having them in one's inventory is enough.

quests.name: Magma Crucible
quests.description: Melts particular items into their fluid form.

tasks.longDescription: A task where the player needs specific items. These do not have to be handed in, having them in one's inventory is enough.

quests.name: Fluid Transposer
quests.description: Processes fluids into another item for example Resonant Ender into a bucket of Resonant Ender.

tasks.longDescription: A task where the player needs specific items. These do not have to be handed in, having them in one's inventory is enough.
A task where the player has to craft specific items.

quests.name: Glacial Extruder
quests.description: Produces snowballs, snow, or ice by freezing water pumped into it.

tasks.longDescription: A task where the player needs specific items. These do not have to be handed in, having them in one's inventory is enough.

quests.name: igneous Precipitator
quests.description: Produces cobblestone, stone, or obsidian by pumping lava and water into it.

tasks.longDescription: A task where the player needs specific items. These do not have to be handed in, having them in one's inventory is enough.

quests.name: Sag Mill
quests.description: Produces dusts from ores put into it and #1 source of silicon.

quests.name: Alloy Smelter
quests.description: Acts as a normal furnace but has an added a bility to alloy up to 3 items together.

quests.name: Double Capacitor
quests.description: Causes machines to work twice as fast and efficient.

tasks.longDescription: A task where the player has to craft specific items.

quests.name: Octadic Capacitor
quests.description: Causes machines to work eight times as fast and efficient.

tasks.longDescription: A task where the player has to craft specific items.

quests.name: Energized Alloy
quests.description: Alloyed using Gold, Redstone and Glowstone.

quests.name: Vibrant Alloy
quests.description: Alloyed using Energetic Alloy and Ender Pearls.

quests.name: The Vat
quests.description: Produces specific fluids used for Ender IO.

quests.name: Flux Bank Tier 1
quests.description: A multiblockish energy storage that can cause a bit of lag if energy is constantly going in/out and if there is a lot of them.

tasks.longDescription: A task where the player has to craft specific items.

quests.name: Flux Bank Tier 2
quests.description: A multiblockish energy storage that can cause a bit of lag if energy is constantly going in/out and if there is a lot of them.

tasks.longDescription: A task where the player has to craft specific items.

quests.name: Flux Bank Tier 3
quests.description: A multiblockish energy storage that can cause a bit of lag if energy is constantly going in/out and if there is a lot of them.

tasks.longDescription: A task where the player has to craft specific items.

quests.name: Enchanter
quests.description: A better enchanting table that allows you to pick the enchants you want with a price.

quests.name: Electrical Alloy
quests.description: Alloyed using Iron, Silicon and Pulverized Coal.

quests.name: Pulsating Iron
quests.description: Alloyed using Iron and Ender Pearl.

quests.name: Dark Steel
quests.description: Alloyed using Iron, Obsidian and Pulverized Coal.

quests.name: Soul-Infused Alloy
quests.description: Alloyed using Soul Sand and Gold.

quests.name: Slice'N'Splice
quests.description: Produces special mob heads using specific mob heads and the durability of an axe and shears.

quests.name: Soul Binder
quests.description: Produces Ender IOs crystals using mob souls and XP.

quests.name: Enchanted Crystals
quests.description: Crystal made from the Soul Binder.

quests.name: Tormented Heads
quests.description: Special skulls made from the Slice'N'Splice.

quests.name: Wireless Charger
quests.description: Charges RF based tools for about 10k blocks, at least it should be that wide.

tasks.longDescription: A task where the player has to craft specific items.

quests.name: Reservoir
quests.description: Two buckets of water makes this an infinite water source.

quests.name: Signal Ingot
quests.description: Alloyed using Redstone, silver, and Copper.

quests.name: Lumium
quests.description: Alloyed using Glowstone, Tin, and Silver.

quests.name: Enderium
quests.description: Alloyed using Platinum/Shiny, Resonant Ender, Tin and Silver.

quests.name: Vibrantium
quests.description: Alloyed using Enticing Crystals, Vibrant Alloy and Soularium.

quests.name: Phytogenetic Insolation
quests.description: Can Produce more crops with RF, Sunlight, and Fertilizer/ Rich Fertilizer.

tasks.longDescription: A task where the player needs specific items. These do not have to be handed in, having them in one's inventory is enough.

quests.name: CONNNNNN!
quests.description: Conduits that can be fitted into one block space up to 5.

quests.name: Flux-Infused Electrum
quests.description: Alloyed using Electrum, Pyrotheum and Redstone.

quests.name: Flux Crystal
quests.description: Acrystal made from adding Redstone to a Diamond.
